ðŸ“– Summary: pysimdjson provides Python bindings for the simdjson library, enabling SIMD-accelerated JSON parsing for improved performance. It includes a fallback parser for systems without SIMD support, ensuring compatibility across different platforms. The library is tested on multiple operating systems and Python versions, making it a reliable solution for fast JSON processing.
